short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BSB Changes the background of steamcommunity.com to my Cat Danny (Profile-backgrounds are not affected by this change)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better Steamcommunity Background will change the background of  any steamcommunity.com site you visit to my Cat Danny.

This extension will change the background of the following Steam-Sites:
-  inventory 
-  badges 
-  screenshots (content)
-  games tab
-  home (activity)
-  market
-  workshop
-  discussions

However, this extension won't affect the following sites:
-  (your or someone's steam profile)
-  groups
-  friends
-  the broadcasts page
-  the steamcommunity home page
